<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_hub_action_type_definition"><sys_hub_action_type_definition action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><acls/><action_status/><action_template>DATASTREAM</action_template><active>true</active><annotation/><callable_by_client_api>false</callable_by_client_api><category display_value="Host Management">9f3f0ba353a00110f263ddeeff7b12fa</category><copied_from/><copied_from_name/><description><p>Retrieves list of hosts which are active since the given date. </p>

<p><b>Inputs:</b></p>
<ul>
    <li><b>Active Since</b> - Date from which the active hosts will be retrieved. </li>
</ul>

<p><b>Outputs:</b></p>
<ul>
    <li><b>Hosts</b>
        <ul>
          <li><b>ID</b> – Host ID.</li>
        </ul>
    </li>
</ul>

<p>To use this action, the corresponding CrowdStrike connection and credential must be created and associated with the <b>CrowdStrike</b> Connection & Credential alias. <a target=”_blank” href="http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:credentials-connections-alias">Learn More</a></p>

<p><b>Note</b>: Requires a subscription for production use. <a target=”_blank” href="https://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:IntegrationHub-licensing-information">Read More</a>. 06:42:38</sys_updated_on><value>(function parse(inputs, outputs) {

  var item = JSON.parse(inputs.sourceItem);
  var obj = [];
  if (item.length > 0 && !item.hasOwnProperty("pagination")) {
    var big_array = item;
    var count = big_array.length/1000;
    if (big_array.length%1000 != 0) {
      count++;
    }
    count = parseInt(count, 10);
    for (var i=0; i < count; i++) {
      var objArr = {};
      var chunk_array = big_array.slice(i * 1000, i * 1000 + 1000);
      var output_obj = chunk_array;
      objArr["ids"] = output_obj;
      obj.push(objArr);
    }
    outputs.targetObject.hosts_list = obj;
  }
  else {
    outputs.state = 'SKIP';
  }

})(inputs, outputs);</value><variable display_value="Script">688bea3e8723230057a8ed4d87cb0b05</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_element_mapping action="delete_multiple" display_value="Host Management">9f3f0ba353a00110f263ddeeff7b12fa</category><copied_from/><copied_from_name/><description><p>Retrieves list of hosts which are active since the given date. </p>

<p><b>Inputs:</b></p>
<ul>
    <li><b>Active Since</b> - Date from which the active hosts will be retrieved. </li>
</ul>

<p><b>Outputs:</b></p>
<ul>
    <li><b>Hosts</b>
        <ul>
          <li><b>ID</b> – Host ID.</li>
        </ul>
    </li>
</ul>

<p>To use this action, the corresponding CrowdStrike connection and credential must be created and associated with the <b>CrowdStrike</b> Connection & Credential alias. <a target=”_blank” href="http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:credentials-connections-alias">Learn More</a></p>

<p><b>Note</b>: Requires a subscription for production use. <a target=”_blank” href="https://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:IntegrationHub-licensing-information">Read More</a>. 06:43:24</sys_updated_on><value>(function parse(inputs, outputs) {

  var item = JSON.parse(inputs.sourceItem);
  var obj = [];
  if (item.length > 0 && !item.hasOwnProperty("pagination")) {
    var big_array = item;
    var count = big_array.length/1000;
    if (big_array.length%1000 != 0) {
      count++;
    }
    count = parseInt(count, 10);
    for (var i=0; i < count; i++) {
      var objArr = {};
      var chunk_array = big_array.slice(i * 1000, i * 1000 + 1000);
      var output_obj = chunk_array;
      objArr["ids"] = output_obj;
      obj.push(objArr);
    }
    outputs.targetObject.hosts_list = obj;
  }
  else {
    outputs.state = 'SKIP';
  }

})(inputs, outputs);</value><variable display_value="Script">688bea3e8723230057a8ed4d87cb0b05</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_element_mapping action="delete_multiple" sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_hub_action_type_definition"><sys_hub_action_type_definition action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><acls/><action_status/><action_template/><active>true</active><annotation/><callable_by_client_api>false</callable_by_client_api><category display_value="Host Management">9f3f0ba353a00110f263ddeeff7b12fa</category><copied_from/><copied_from_name/><description><p> Retrieves details of a host</p>

<p><b>Inputs:</b></p>
<ul>
    <li><b>Host IDs</b> - Array of host IDs. </li>
</ul>

<p><b>Outputs:</b></p>
<ul>
    <li><b>Hosts</b>
        <ul>
            <li>Device ID – Device ID of the host device.</li>
            <li>CID – Customer identification.</li>
            <li>Agent Version – Version of the agent.</li>
            <li>BIOS Manufacturer – BIOS manufacturer of the device.</li>
            <li>BIOS Version – BIOS version of the device.</li>
            <li>Build Number – Build number of the device.</li>
            <li>External IP – External IP address of the device.</li>
            <li>Mac Address – Mac address of the device.</li>
            <li>Host Name – Host name of the device </li>
            <li>First Seen  – First time the device was seen.</li>
            <li>Last Seen – Last time the device was seen.</li>
            <li>Local IP – Local IP address of the device. </li>
            <li>OS Version – Version of operating system of the device. </li>
            <li>OS Build – Build of operating systemof the device. </li>
            <li>Platform – Platform of the device. </li>
            <li>Product Type – Type of device. </li>
            <li>Provision Status – Provisioning status of the device. </li>
            <li> Serial Number – Serial number of the device.</li>
            <li>System Manufaturer – System manufacturer of the device. </li>
            <li>System Product Name – System product name of the device. </li>
        </ul>
    </li>
    <li><b>Status</b> - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure, Status is set to “Error”.
    <li><b>Error Message</b> - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs. </li>
</ul>

<p><b>Error Messages:</b></p>
<ul>
    <li>Invalid credentials. Check with your system administrator. </li>
    <li>No matching device found. </li>
    <li> Unexpected error occurred. Check with your system administrator. </li>
</ul>

<p>To use this action, the corresponding CrowdStrike connection and credential must be created and associated with the <b>CrowdStrike</b> Connection & Credential alias. <a target=”_blank” href="http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:credentials-connections-alias">Learn More</a></p>

<p><b>Note</b>: Requires a subscription for production use. <a target=”_blank” href="https://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:IntegrationHub-licensing-information">Read More</a>. </p></description><ih_action>true</ih_action><internal_name>look_up_host_details</internal_name><label_cache>[{"name":"{{action.task}}","label":"action➛Task","type":"action","ref":"","reference_display":"","base_type":"string","parent_table_name":"","column_name":"","choices":null,"attributes":{}},{"name":"{{action.limit}}","label":"action➛Limit","type":"action","ref":"","reference_display":"","base_type":"string","parent_table_name":"","column_name":"","choices":null,"attributes":{}},{"name":"{{action.workspace}}","label":"action➛Workspace","type":"action","ref":"","reference_display":"","base_type":"string","parent_table_name":"","column_name":"","choices":null,"attributes":{}},{"name":"{{action.modified_after}}","label":"action➛Modified 08:34:56</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
  if (inputs.status_code == '200' || inputs.status_code == '404') {
    var resp = inputs.resp;
    var msg = JSON.parse(resp);
    var device_data = msg.resources;
    var output_array = [];
    for (var i=0;i<device_data.length;i++) {
      var device_id = device_data[i].device_id;
      var cid = device_data[i].cid;
      var agent_ver = device_data[i].agent_version;
      var bios_man = device_data[i].bios_manufacturer;
      var bios_ver = device_data[i].bios_versoin;
      var build_num = device_data[i].build_number;
      var ext_ip = device_data[i].external_ip;
      var mac_add = device_data[i].mac_address;
      var hn = device_data[i].hostname;
      var first_seen = device_data[i].first_seen;
      var last_seen = device_data[i].last_seen;
      var local_ip = device_data[i].local_ip;
      var os_ver = device_data[i].os_version;
      var os_build = device_data[i].os_build;
      var platform = device_data[i].platform_name;
      var prod_type = device_data[i].product_type_desc;
      var prov_status = device_data[i].provision_status;
      var sn = device_data[i].serial_number;
      var sys_man = device_data[i].system_manufacturer;
      var sys_prod_name = device_data[i].system_product_name;
      var output_obj = {"device_id":device_id,"cid":cid,"agent_version":agent_ver,"bios_manufacturer":bios_man,"bios_version":bios_ver,"build_number":build_num,"external_ip":ext_ip,"mac_address":mac_add,"host_name":hn,"first_seen":first_seen,"last_seen":last_seen,"local_ip":local_ip,"os_version":os_ver,"os_build":os_build,"platform":platform,"product_type":prod_type,"provision_status":prov_status,"serial_number":sn,"system_manufacturer":sys_man,"system_product_name":sys_prod_name};
      output_array.push(output_obj);
    }
    outputs.devices = output_array;
  }
  else if (inputs.status_code == '401') {
    outputs.status='Error';
    outputs.error_message='Authentication failed. Check with your system administrator';
  }
  else {
    outputs.status='Error';
    outputs.error_message='Unexpected error occurred. Check with your system administrator.';
    gs.error(inputs.error_message);
  }
})(inputs, outputs);

action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><acls/><action_status/><action_template/><annotation/><callable_by_client_api>false</callable_by_client_api><category display_value="Host Management">9f3f0ba353a00110f263ddeeff7b12fa</category><copied_from/><copied_from_name/><description><p> Retrieves details of a host</p>

<p><b>Inputs:</b></p>
<ul>
    <li><b>Host IDs</b> - Array of host IDs. </li>
</ul>

<p><b>Outputs:</b></p>
<ul>
    <li><b>Hosts</b>
        <ul>
            <li>Device ID – Device ID of the host device.</li>
            <li>CID – Customer identification.</li>
            <li>Agent Version – Version of the agent.</li>
            <li>BIOS Manufacturer – BIOS manufacturer of the device.</li>
            <li>BIOS Version – BIOS version of the device.</li>
            <li>Build Number – Build number of the device.</li>
            <li>External IP – External IP address of the device.</li>
            <li>Mac Address – Mac address of the device.</li>
            <li>Host Name – Host name of the device </li>
            <li>First Seen  – First time the device was seen.</li>
            <li>Last Seen – Last time the device was seen.</li>
            <li>Local IP – Local IP address of the device. </li>
            <li>OS Version – Version of operating system of the device. </li>
            <li>OS Build – Build of operating systemof the device. </li>
            <li>Platform – Platform of the device. </li>
            <li>Product Type – Type of device. </li>
            <li>Provision Status – Provisioning status of the device. </li>
            <li> Serial Number – Serial number of the device.</li>
            <li>System Manufaturer – System manufacturer of the device. </li>
            <li>System Product Name – System product name of the device. </li>
        </ul>
    </li>
    <li><b>Status</b> - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure, Status is set to “Error”.
    <li><b>Error Message</b> - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs. </li>
</ul>

<p><b>Error Messages:</b></p>
<ul>
    <li>Invalid credentials. Check with your system administrator. </li>
    <li>No matching device found. </li>
    <li> Unexpected error occurred. Check with your system administrator. </li>
</ul>

<p>To use this action, the corresponding CrowdStrike connection and credential must be created and associated with the <b>CrowdStrike</b> Connection & Credential alias. <a target=”_blank” href="http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:credentials-connections-alias">Learn More</a></p>

<p><b>Note</b>: Requires a subscription for production use. <a target=”_blank” href="https://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:IntegrationHub-licensing-information">Read More</a>. 20:11:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>3c69eebb53e00110f263ddeeff7b1299</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-10 08:35:04</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
  if (inputs.status_code == '200' || inputs.status_code == '404') {
    var resp = inputs.resp;
    var msg = JSON.parse(resp);
    var device_data = msg.resources;
    var output_array = [];
    for (var i=0;i<device_data.length;i++) {
      var device_id = device_data[i].device_id;
      var cid = device_data[i].cid;
      var agent_ver = device_data[i].agent_version;
      var bios_man = device_data[i].bios_manufacturer;
      var bios_ver = device_data[i].bios_versoin;
      var build_num = device_data[i].build_number;
      var ext_ip = device_data[i].external_ip;
      var mac_add = device_data[i].mac_address;
      var hn = device_data[i].hostname;
      var first_seen = device_data[i].first_seen;
      var last_seen = device_data[i].last_seen;
      var local_ip = device_data[i].local_ip;
      var os_ver = device_data[i].os_version;
      var os_build = device_data[i].os_build;
      var platform = device_data[i].platform_name;
      var prod_type = device_data[i].product_type_desc;
      var prov_status = device_data[i].provision_status;
      var sn = device_data[i].serial_number;
      var sys_man = device_data[i].system_manufacturer;
      var sys_prod_name = device_data[i].system_product_name;
      var output_obj = {"device_id":device_id,"cid":cid,"agent_version":agent_ver,"bios_manufacturer":bios_man,"bios_version":bios_ver,"build_number":build_num,"external_ip":ext_ip,"mac_address":mac_add,"host_name":hn,"first_seen":first_seen,"last_seen":last_seen,"local_ip":local_ip,"os_version":os_ver,"os_build":os_build,"platform":platform,"product_type":prod_type,"provision_status":prov_status,"serial_number":sn,"system_manufacturer":sys_man,"system_product_name":sys_prod_name};
      output_array.push(output_obj);
    }
    outputs.devices = output_array;
  }
  else if (inputs.status_code == '401') {
    outputs.status='Error';
    outputs.error_message='Authentication failed. Check with your system administrator';
  }
  else {
    outputs.status='Error';
    outputs.error_message='Unexpected error occurred. Check with your system administrator.';
    gs.error(inputs.error_message);
  }
})(inputs, outputs);
</value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value
